donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
The Upazila Governance Project (UZGP) falls within the programmatic framework of the Deepening Local Democracy and Scaling up support of the MDGs initiative. The objective of this project is "Strengthened capacities of local governments and other stakeholders to foster participatory local development service delivery for the MDGs." The project is expected to deliver the following three outputs:
1) Strengthened Upazila Parishads as more functional, democratic transparent and accountable institutions
2) Strengthened Planning and Budgeting system at UZP with MDG orientation and pro-poor service delivery mechanism 
3) Strengthened  technical capacity of  Local Government Division for effective policy review, monitoring, lesson learning and capacity development of LGIs for improved Local Governance.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
The Union Parishad Governance Project (UPGP) falls within the programmatic framework of the Deepening Local Democracy and Scaling UP Support for the MDGs initiative. The objective of this project is "Strengthened capacities of local governments and other stakeholders to foster participatory local development service delivery for the MDGs" The following three outputs are expected from the project:
1) Strengthened Democratic Accountability and Transparency of the Union Parishad through citizen engagement
2) Improved innovations in pro-poor and MDG Planning, Financing and Implementation of service delivery by Union Parishads
3) Strengthened technical capacity of Local Governance Division for effective policy review, monitoring, Lesson learning and capacity development of LGIs for improved Local Governance.
